verses.roman:
eta mate kari' kailuṅ gauḍere gamana
sahasreka saṅge haila nija-bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: eta—such; mate—decision; kari'-making; kailuṅ—I did; gauḍere—to Bengal; gamana—going; sahasreka—thousands of men; saṅge—with Me; haila—there were; nija-bhakta-gaṇa—My own devotees.
translation: "Thus I went to Bengal, but thousands of devotees began to follow Me.
